channel.title: Selling custom items
channel.description: I made a custom item for my server. it works great. i added the item to the items.cfg in my server with a price and all that but when i go to a general store (which accepts any items) it says i can not sell dragon claws. dragon claws is just an example. im not sure why though. i also dont have a noted model for the item if thts the problem but i can make one. pelase let me know what the problem is. thnks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 09:50:00 pm[/size][hr]if the problem is that it has to have a noted option then can somone tell me how to make it noted?

item.title: Selling custom items
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

but they are tradeble cause i didnt add them anywhre in the client except item.java. and i caan trade them with other people, but not with shop[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 11:41:27 pm[/size][hr]nvm, i just added a line in item.java “issellable[ID] = true;” and it works perfectly. thnks for ur help though

Read full topic

item.title: Selling custom items
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

You haev to remove them from the non tradable items.

Read full topic
